name: Arthur's Revenge
description:
"Arthur's Revenge" is a 2d platformer game about a king who wants to take revenge on his enemies and get his Kingdom back. Hit your enemies with your spear, collect coins and buy upgrades with them, visit various levels and caches to defeat all the enemies.

This is a game for those who love old games and exploring the game world. For his attention the player will be generously rewarded with coins and improvements in each secret zone. Use your spear to kill enemies, but be careful - some of the opponents have solid armor on the front. Buy health improvements and first aid kits from statues in exchange for gold, this will simplify the task. Complete all the levels and defeat the main villain to make sure justice is restored!

Game Features:
  • Secret places, can you find them all?
  • Old school gameplay
  • Awesome pixel graphics
  • Energetic music
